description: Supersize your favourite childhood treat with this simple two-ingredient treat recipe.
name: Giant Chocolate Freckle Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g Woolworths dark cooking chocolate, broken into pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Place chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl and microwave for 2 minutes on high, stirring every thirty seconds, or until chocolate is melted.
Add 100s and 1000s to a large lipped tray. Spoon chocolate into the centre of the tray, allowing it to spread to a round on top of the 100s and 1000s.
Refrigerate for 1 hour, or until chocolate is set. Remove giant freckle from 100s and 1000s. Keep refrigerated until ready to serve.
